item.title: Report X-2024020132
item.description:
Report X-2024020132

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-12T18:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-29
  • City: ATLANTA
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH AND HAD FROST FORMING ON ONE CORNER. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY 8 POUNDS OF DRY ICE PELLETS COOLING FOOD. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE DRY ICE WAS BEING SHIPPED AIR SERVICE. THE INNER BOX DOES HAVE A STICKER APPLIED STATING CAUTION: DRY ICE (CARBON DIOXIDE-SOLID) WITH ADDITIONAL WARNING DETAILS. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM GEORGIA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER C71309, ACRES OAK KITCHEN, 4420 FORSYTH RD., MACON GA 31210-0512.
